meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spiny.
meanings.sent1: The cactus's spininess made it difficult to touch.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the spininess of the hedgehog when I tried to pet it.
meanings.sent3: The spininess of the porcupine's quills made it look like a walking pincushion.
meanings.sent4: The spininess of the sea urchin's shell served as a natural defense mechanism.
meanings.sent5: The spininess of the plant served as a warning to predators.

meanings.definition: The presence of spines or thorns.
meanings.sent1: I carefully avoided the spininess of the rose bush.
meanings.sent2: The spininess of the cactus protected it from being eaten by animals.
meanings.sent3: The spininess of the hedgehog's quills made it look like a tiny warrior.
meanings.sent4: The spininess of the porcupine's quills reminded me of a medieval mace.
meanings.sent5: The spininess of the thorns on the blackberry bush deterred me from picking the fruit.
